overview: The Pararoos are the Australian national football team in international 7-a-side competition for athletes with cerebral palsy, acquired brain injuries or injuries acquired from a stroke. They are a side that faced many hurdles in their personal lives as well as in their journeys to represent Australia on the world stage. This film explores different players' personalities, the world of Paralympic football and the importance of sport in mental and physical rehabilitation.
title: The Pararoos
